hotel_name: Hampton Inn Suites National HarborAlexandria Area
review_text: The only problem I have was their sensorize INNCOM thermostat for air conditioning unit to start-up. If there are not movement inside the room, it will not kick in..... sucks!! the trick is, you have to keep moving while sleeping to keep the AC running (LOL)....
review_title: Overall it was good but AC sucks!!
